row.scheme: (set-cdr! wrap:Op0 d-Set0) (set-cdr! wrap:Op1 d-Set1) (set-cdr! wrap:Op2 d-Set2) (set-cdr! wrap:Op3 d-Set3) (set-cdr! wrap:Op4 d-Set4) (set-cdr! wrap:Op5 d-Set5) (set-cdr! wrap:Op6 d-Set6) (set-cdr! wrap:Op7 d-Set7) (set-cdr! wrap:Op8 d-SetBreve) (set-cdr! wrap:Op9 d-SetLonga) (Help::RemoveTag 'doublestroke)
row._label: Change to 'Select Duration' Number Keys in Composer Mode
row._tooltip: Change the number keys to select the prevailing duration in composer mode.
